ground_truth_reviews.comment: The email comparison here is case-sensitive. This can lead to incorrect search results if the provided email has a different casing than the one stored in the database (e.g., 'user@example.com' vs. 'User@Example.com'). To ensure correctness, you should normalize both emails to a common case, typically lowercase, before comparing them: `if post_dict["author_email"].lower() == email.lower():`.

title: feat: Add service method to find posts by author
body: This change introduces a new method `get_posts_by_author_email` to the `PostService`. This allows retrieving all posts associated with a specific author's email address, which will be used by an upcoming API endpoint.
